#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define MAX 1000
int main()
{
     char c[MAX];
     int t,len,i;
     scanf("%d",&t);
     while(t--)
     {

	scanf("%s",c);
	len=strlen(c);
	for(i=0;i<len;i++)
	{
	   if(c[i]=='4' || c[i]=='5' || c[i]=='7' || c[i]=='2' || c[i]=='3')
	   {
	       printf("NO\n");
	       break;

	   }
	   else
	   {
               if(c[i]=='9')
                  c[i]='6';
               else if(c[i]=='6')
                  c[i]='9'; 
	       
	   }
	}
	   if(i==len)
	   {
	      c[i]='\0';
	      printf("YES\n");
	      for(i=i-1;i>=0;i--)
                  printf("%c",c[i]);
              printf("\n");

	   }
         

}





return 0;

}
